analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Yadā, bhikkhave, devo devakāyā cavanadhammo hoti, pañcassa pubbanimittāni pātubhavanti—
analyzed: yadā bhikkhave devaḥ deva kāyā cavana dhammaḥ hoti pañcassa pubba nimittāni pātubhavanti

original: mālā milāyanti, vatthāni kilissanti, kacchehi sedā muccanti, kāye dubbaṇṇiyaṁ okkamati, sake devo devāsane nābhiramatīti.
analyzed: mālāḥ milāyanti vatthāni kilissanti kacchehi sedāḥ muccanti kāye dubbaṇṇiyam okkamati sake devaḥ devāsane na abhiramati iti

original: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, devā ‘cavanadhammo ayaṁ devaputto’ti iti viditvā tīhi vācāhi anumodenti:
analyzed: tam ena bhikkhave devā cavana dhammo ayam deva putto ti iti viditvā tīhi vācāhi anumodenti
sugatim gantvā su laddha lābham labha
su laddha lābham labhitvā su patiṭṭhitaḥ bhavāhi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte aññataraḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca
kim nu khalu bhante sugati gamana saṅkhāta
kiñca bhante su laddha lābha saṅkhāta
kim pana bhante devānam suppatiṭṭhita saṅkhātanti
manussa ttam kho bhikkhu devānam sugati gamana saṅkhāta

original: Yaṁ manussabhūto samāno tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye saddhaṁ paṭilabhati;
analyzed: yam manussa bhūtaḥ samānaḥ tathāgata ppavedite dhamma vinaye saddham paṭilabhati
idam kho bhikkhu devānam su laddha lābha saṅkhāta

original: Sā kho panassa saddhā niviṭṭhā hoti mūlajātā patiṭṭhitā daḷhā asaṁhāriyā samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ;
analyzed: sā kho panassa saddhā niviṭṭhā hoti mūla jātā patiṭṭhitā daḷhā a sahāriyā samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenacid vā lokasmi
idam kho bhikkhu devānam su patiṭṭhita saṅkhātanti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
